TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定可以使用列舉進一步偵測成員。

span.span: Specifies that the member can be further detected by using an enumeration.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Choices`包含兩個欄位，`MyChoice`和`ManyChoices`。The following example serializes a class named `Choices` that includes two fields, `MyChoice` and `ManyChoices`. 套用至指定的每個欄位 (透過屬性) 可取得或設定列舉，偵測到的成員值的另一個類別成員。The is applied to each field that specifies (through the property) another class member that gets or sets an enumeration that detects the member value. `MyChoice`欄位可以設定為單一值，與對應的列舉成員中找到`EnumType`欄位。The `MyChoice` field can be set to a single value, with a corresponding enumeration member found in the `EnumType` field. `ManyChoices`欄位會傳回物件的陣列。The `ManyChoices` field returns an array of objects. `ChoiceArray`欄位傳回列舉值的陣列。The `ChoiceArray` field returns an array of enumeration values. 在每個陣列成員`ManyChoices` 欄位中，所傳回的陣列中找到對應的成員`ChoiceArray`欄位。For each array member in the `ManyChoices` field, a corresponding member is found in the array returned by the `ChoiceArray` field. [!code-cpp[XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example/CPP/choice.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example/CS/choice.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example/VB/choice.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: 成員名稱，傳回用於偵測選擇的列舉型別。

span.span: The member name that returns the enumeration used to detect a choice.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MemberName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定欄位的名稱，該欄位傳回偵測型別時使用的列舉型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the field that returns the enumeration to use when detecting types.

value.span: 傳回列舉型別之欄位的名稱。

span.span: The name of a field that returns an enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 至少一個成員必須出現在列舉中的欄位中所傳回值。At least one member must be present in the enumeration returned by the field named in the value. 根據預設，該列舉型別名稱可接受的欄位名稱會套用至。By default, that enumeration name takes the name of the field that the is applied to. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Choices`包含兩個欄位，`MyChoice`和`ManyChoices`。The following example serializes a class named `Choices` that includes two fields, `MyChoice` and `ManyChoices`. 套用至指定的每個欄位 (透過屬性) 可取得或設定列舉，偵測到的成員值的另一個類別成員。The is applied to each field that specifies (through the property) another class member that gets or sets an enumeration that detects the member value. `MyChoice`欄位可以設定為單一值，與對應的列舉成員中找到`EnumType`欄位。The `MyChoice` field can be set to a single value, with a corresponding enumeration member found in the `EnumType` field. `ManyChoices`欄位會傳回物件的陣列。The `ManyChoices` field returns an array of objects. `ChoiceArray`欄位傳回列舉值的陣列。The `ChoiceArray` field returns an array of enumeration values. 在每個陣列成員`ManyChoices` 欄位中，所傳回的陣列中找到對應的成員`ChoiceArray`欄位。For each array member in the `ManyChoices` field, a corresponding member is found in the array returned by the `ChoiceArray` field. [!code-cpp[XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example/CPP/choice.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example/CS/choice.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlChoiceIdentifierAttribute Example/VB/choice.vb#1)]
